name: Monochrome (GeniusApple)
description:
Made this game in 20 minutes, I know it's not too good, but I feel good saying that I put up something.

Theme: Two Sides

Interpretation: Two sides of one player. You both move together and intereact with your own colors. [Black and jump on black, but not on white and so on]

Objective: Get both players, to the floating white square in each level

//my notes

-yes it sucks

-took only 20 minutes

-I should keep trying

-I'm too tired :D
